definitions.definition: An apparatus composed of a wheel which spins inside of a frame ( gimbal ) and causes the balancing of the frame in any direction or position. In the form of a gyroscopic stabilizer , used to help keep aircraft and ships steady.

main_definition: An apparatus composed of a wheel which spins inside of a frame ( gimbal ) and causes the balancing of the frame in any direction or position. In the form of a gyroscopic stabilizer , used to help keep aircraft and ships steady.
